name: Angel Wings
desc: A single flap will send you soaring!

name: Devil Wings
desc: Fall from the sky with unholy speed!

name: Reflect generator
desc: Protect yourself from anything that violates your space with a repulsive shield!

name: Flame thrower
desc: Short ranged weapon that can heat up your opponent's balloons, making it pop !

name: Marble launcher
desc: Shoot up a marble out from the back to throw off enemies in the sky!

name: Jet
desc: Powerful light-weight rocket for horizontal movement. It's as strong as your battery

name: .357 Magnum
desc: This gun has been approved by the balloon popping federation. It can't kill, but it will pop!
